## icons.registry.register() function

Registers the given icon so that it can be deserialized.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function register(type: IconType<IIcon>, iconConstructor: new (block: Block) => IIcon): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | [IconType](./blockly.icons.icontype.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IIcon](./blockly.iicon.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The type of the icon to register. This should be the same string that is returned from its <code>getType</code> method. |
|  iconConstructor | new (block: [Block](./blockly.block.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; [IIcon](./blockly.iicon.md) | The icon class/constructor to register. |

**Returns:**

void
